pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Cho Den-O Trilogy: EPISODE YELLOW: Treasure DE-End Pirates (2010, movie)$(br2)Used to craft Diend's $(l:decade/items/k_touch_diend)Final Kamen Terminal K-Touch (Diend)$(/l)$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:ryuki/riders/ryuga)Kamen Rider Ryuga$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l)
